My command list is divided into 15 categories. Click on the select menu below and choose the desired category <:SkyeIssoai2:823248929700446228>

<:support:864262916270325830> __**SUPPORT:**__

AÇÕES_DESCRIÇÃO:

**`{{prefix}}`feed**

**`{{prefix}}`smug**

**`{{prefix}}`disgust**
❯ Express a reaction of disgust.

**`{{prefix}}`happy**

**`{{prefix}}`baka**

ANIME_DESCRIÇÃO:
Anime Commands:
**`{{prefix}}`aniquote**
❯ Generate a random anime quote.
**`{{prefix}}`anitoday**
❯ Displays the list of anime currently airing for today's date.
**`{{prefix}}`anirandom**
❯ Generates a random anime recommendation. Recommends a Hentai if used on a nsfw channel.
**`{{prefix}}`anime**
❯ Searches for a specific anime in <:MyAnimeList:827773575112425472> [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net 'Homepage').
**`{{prefix}}`anisearch**
❯ Search for various animes belonging to the search term. Maximum of 10 results.
**`{{prefix}}`hanime**
❯ Consult hanime.tv for a specific hentai. Returns a maximum of 10 results.
**`{{prefix}}`malprofile**
❯ Finds user profile on myanimelist based on the provided query.
**`{{prefix}}`manga**
❯ Searches for a Manga / Manhwa / Manhua in <:MyAnimeList:827773575112425472> [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net.co 'Homepage').
**`{{prefix}}`animeme**
❯ Generate an anime meme fetched from selected <:reddit:838088411399061504> [Subreddits](https://reddit.com 'Homepage'). Include 'reload' parameter to reload meme cache. Memes generated are in order by default, add 'r', 'random', or 'randomize' to randomize meme.
**`{{prefix}}`character**
❯ Searches for a character in <:MyAnimeList:827773575112425472> [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net 'Homepage').
**`{{prefix}}`nextani**
❯ Displays the list of upcoming animes of the current season.
**`{{prefix}}`nextep**
❯ Shows the remaining time for the next episode of given anime. Returns this day's schedule, if no anime is specified
**`{{prefix}}`anitop**
❯ Search one of the best anime on MyAnimeList.net or return a random one.
**`{{prefix}}`waifu**
❯ Generates random waifu.

 use `{{prefix}}bug <message>`**

ECONOMIA_DESCRIÇÃO:
**NOTICE: TO START USING ANY Hope ECONOMY ADDON COMMAND, YOU NEED TO REGISTER USING THE COMMAND (`{{prefix}}REGISTER`)**

Economy Commands:
**`{{prefix}}`daily**
❯ Get a daily cash reward for the Economy addon.
**`{{prefix}}`buy**
❯ Buy something at Hope's store.
**`{{prefix}}`custom-background**
❯ Customize your profile background with an image of your choice.
**`{{prefix}}`setbirthday**
❯ Sets the Economia birthday for your profile card.
**`{{prefix}}`setbio**
❯ Sets the profile bio for your profile card.
**`{{prefix}}`setcolor**
❯ Sets the color for your profile card.
**`{{prefix}}`set-gender <male | female>**
❯ Set your gender in the profile.
**`{{prefix}}`set-region**
❯ Sets your region in the profile.
**`{{prefix}}`deposit**
❯ Deposit an amount of money from the Economy addon into your bank account.
**`{{prefix}}`unequip**
❯ Unequip a certain item.
**`{{prefix}}`use**
❯ Equip an item in your profile.
**`{{prefix}}`alms**
❯ Ask for alms and receive a small amount of money.
**`{{prefix}}`inventory**
❯ Check your items.
**`{{prefix}}`game**
❯ Play some games to earn credits.
**`{{prefix}}`shop**
❯ Check what you can buy from the shop.
**`{{prefix}}`moneylb**
❯ Displays the rank of the richest people on the server.
**`{{prefix}}`pay**
❯ Send money to a user.
**`{{prefix}}`profile**
❯ Displays the profile of the named user.
**`{{prefix}}`fish**
❯ Take a fishing trip.
**`{{prefix}}`viewitem**
❯ Check what you can buy from the shop.
**`{{prefix}}`register**
❯ Start earning money. Register to keep track of your earned money!
**`{{prefix}}`roulette**
❯ Place a bet on roulette for money.
**`{{prefix}}`rob**
❯ Try your luck stealing money from some user of the server.
**`{{prefix}}`withdraw**
❯ Withdraw money directly from your bank account.
**`{{prefix}}`balance**
❯ Displays your current balance.
**`{{prefix}}`slots**
❯ Slots Game | 9x - rare | 3x - common
**`{{prefix}}`work**
❯ Work to make more money.
**`{{prefix}}`sell**
❯ Sell your items for cash.

 use `{{prefix}}bug <message>`**

EXTRAS_DESCRIÇÃO:
Extras Commands:

**`{{prefix}}`seaofthieves**

HopeDJ_DESCRIÇÃO:
HopeDJ Commands:
**`{{prefix}}`247**
❯ Stay on the voice channel even if no one is on it.
**`{{prefix}}`autoplay**
❯ Enables or disables the autoplay function in HopeDJ.
**`{{prefix}}`previous**
❯ Displays the previous tracks that have been played.
**`{{prefix}}`fast-forward**
❯ Fast forwards the player by your specified amount.
**`{{prefix}}`bassboost**
❯ Bassboost the song.
**`{{prefix}}`search**
❯ Searches for a song.
**`{{prefix}}`join**
❯ Makes the bot join your voice channel.
**`{{prefix}}`queue**
❯ Displays the queue.
**`{{prefix}}`seek**
❯ Sets the playing track's position to the specified position.
**`{{prefix}}`lyrics**
❯ Get lyrics on a song.
**`{{prefix}}`move**
❯ Moves the specified song to the specified position.
**`{{prefix}}`np**
❯ Shows the current song playing.
**`{{prefix}}`p-add**
❯ Add a song to the playlist.
**`{{prefix}}`p-delete**
❯ Delete a playlist.
**`{{prefix}}`p-load**
❯ Load a playlist.
**`{{prefix}}`p-create**
❯ Create a playlist.
**`{{prefix}}`p-remove**
❯ Remove a song from the playlist.
**`{{prefix}}`p-view**
❯ View a playlist.
**`{{prefix}}`nightcore**
❯ Toggles nightcore mode.
**`{{prefix}}`shuffle**
❯ Shuffles the playlist.
**`{{prefix}}`pause**
❯ Pauses the music.
**`{{prefix}}`pitch**
❯ Sets the player's pitch. If you input 'reset', it will set the pitch back to default.
**`{{prefix}}`skip**
❯ Skips the current song.
**`{{prefix}}`radio**
❯ Listen to the radio.
**`{{prefix}}`remove**
❯ Removes a song from the queue.
**`{{prefix}}`loop**
❯ Loops the song or queue.
**`{{prefix}}`resume**
❯ Resumes the music.
**`{{prefix}}`rewind**
❯ Rewinds the player by your specified amount.
**`{{prefix}}`dc**
❯ Disconnects the bot from the voice channel.
**`{{prefix}}`play**
❯ Play a song.
**`{{prefix}}`vaporwave**
❯ Toggles vaporwave mode.
**`{{prefix}}`speed**
❯ Sets the player's playback speed.
**`{{prefix}}`back**
❯ Plays the previous song in the queue.
**`{{prefix}}`volume**
❯ Changes the volume of the song.

<:Informao:823004619805294643> Search Commands:
**`{{prefix}}`covid**
❯ Displays real-time information about covid-19 in a Country.
**`{{prefix}}`fivem**
❯ Get statistics from a server in fivem.
**`{{prefix}}`fortnite**
❯ Gets information from a fortnite account.
**`{{prefix}}`instagram**
❯ Get information from an instagram account.
**`{{prefix}}`minecraft**
❯ Get information from a minecraft server.
**`{{prefix}}`playstore**
❯ Shows information of a game/app in Playstore.
**`{{prefix}}`steam-store**
❯ Search for a game/app on Steam.
**`{{prefix}}`steam**
❯ Gets information from a steam account.
**`{{prefix}}`weather**
❯ Search for weather information of a city.
**`{{prefix}}`twitch**
❯ Get information about a user on Twitch.
**`{{prefix}}`wikipedia**
❯ Search Wikipedia for the specified term.
**`{{prefix}}`youtube**
❯ Search for something on youtube.
**`{{prefix}}`youtube-channel**
❯ Get the detailed statistics of a youtube channel.

 use `{{prefix}}bug <message>`**
MODERAÇÃO_DESCRIÇÃO:
Moderation Commands:
**`{{prefix}}`addroleall**
❯ Adds a role to all users of the server at once.
**`{{prefix}}`clear-warnings**
❯ Remove warnings from a user.
**`{{prefix}}`clear**
❯ Deletes a certain amount of messages.
**`{{prefix}}`warn**
❯ Warn a user.
**`{{prefix}}`warnings**
❯ Display number of warnings a user has.
**`{{prefix}}`ban**
❯ Ban a user.
**`{{prefix}}`banlist**
❯ Displays the server's banned list.
**`{{prefix}}`invite-tracker**
❯ Displays invitation records of a user.
**`{{prefix}}`lockdown**
❯ Locks a channel for a specified time.
**`{{prefix}}`deafen**
❯ Deafen a user.
**`{{prefix}}`unban**
❯ Unban a user.
**`{{prefix}}`unmute**
❯ Unmute a user.
**`{{prefix}}`unlock**
❯ Unlock a channel.
**`{{prefix}}`kick**
❯ Kick a user.
**`{{prefix}}`nuke**
❯ Clears all messages in a channel at once.
**`{{prefix}}`mute**
❯ Mute a user.
**`{{prefix}}`nick**
❯ Change the name of a user.
**`{{prefix}}`premium**
❯ Displays the user/guild status.
**`{{prefix}}`undeafen**
❯ Undeafen a user.
**`{{prefix}}`report**
❯ Report a user.
**`{{prefix}}`redeemcode**
❯ Redeem a code.
**`{{prefix}}`removeroleall**
❯ Removes a role from all users of the server at once.
**`{{prefix}}`snipe**
❯ Capture a recently deleted message on the channel.
**`{{prefix}}`slowmode**
❯ Enables or disables slow mode on a channel.
**`{{prefix}}`lock**
❯ Lock a channel.

💡 **If you find a bug/problem
 use `{{prefix}}bug <message>`**

AJUDA4:
__**Useful links:**__ [Privacy policy](https://hopebot.top/privacy-policy) | [Status](https://hopebot.top/status) | [Become a Partner](https://hopebot.top/news/become-a-partner) | [Website](https://hopebot.top/)

Welcome to Hope's **help** menu!

You can click the __blue button__ to access Hope's **command list** here on the *Discord*, or click [right here](https://hopebot.top/commands) to visit the **command list** on Hope's *Website*.

If you want to access Hope's **ADDONS**, just click on the __green button__, and you can also set them up through Hope's *Dashboard* [by clicking here](https://hopebot.top/dashboard/{{guildid}})!
AJUDA6: Found a bug? or a command that you believe is not working correctly? Use `{{prefix}}bug <message>` to report to my developer!
AJUDA8: Tell everyone what you think of Hope with the `{{prefix}}feedback` command
AJUDA10: Join our [support server](https://discord.com/invite/RC5dmwVapP) if you need help, want to get information about updates and issues or want to offer contributions to Hope!
AJUDA12: Use the `{{prefix}}vote` command to vote for Hope and receive amazing rewards!
AJUDA14: Invite Hope to your server [by clicking here]({{invite}}) and make it a SUPER COOL SERVER.
AJUDA15: Ah! And Thank You for allowing me to be a part of your amazing server <3
